content: easy does it dk this scarf is as easy to knit as it is to wear instructions materials cast on 7 yarn 2 skeins louisa harding increase section yarns giardino 284yds/100g row 1-5 knit to last 3 stitches sl3wyif shown in color 104 row 6 knit 3 stitches kfb knit to last 3 stitches sl3wyif needle 24 circ us7 repeat row 1-6 until almost entire 1st ball is used size & gauge approx 80 long x 12 at spine decrease section 20 sts = 4 in garter row 1-5 knit to last 3 stitches sl3wyif row 6 knit 3 stitches k2tog knit to last 3 stitches sl3wyif abbreviations repeat row 1-6 until 7 stitches remain kfb=knit front and back in the same stitch increased by 1 stitch bind off weave in ends sl3wyif=slip the next 3 stitches one at a time as if to purl with the yarn in front ©2019 darn knit anyway all rights reserved you are allowed to make a copy of this pattern for personal use only in whole or part editing and using the pattern as the basis for another pattern or as a template publishing transmitting darnknitanyway com emailing this pattern to others or posting online in whole or part is strictly prohibited 651 342 1386
